description:
An open-source ebook reader designed for immersive and deep reading experiences.

Readest is a modern, feature-rich ebook reader designed for avid readers offering seamless cross-platform access, powerful tools, and an intuitive interface to elevate your reading experience.
Release Highlight
- TTS: Improved media session control compatibility across more Android systems
- TTS: Made the TTS icon less distracting during read-aloud mode
- Settings: Added an option to adjust screen brightness while reading
- Settings: Added support for custom background images
- PDF: Fixed an issue where scrolling and panning didn’t work correctly when zoomed in
- Android: Added adaptive launcher icon for better system integration
- Reader: Added keyboard shortcuts for toggling bookmarks
- Reader: Annotations are now rendered instantly when opening files
What's Changed
- translator: translate to and from Norwegian Bokmål(nb) by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2158
- i18n: add translations for Swedish(sv) by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2159
- Adds adaptive icon for Android launcher ( issue #2122) by @Nycthera in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2162
- feat: add keyboard shortcuts for toggling bookmarks/sidebar, importing books and closing window by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2170
- compat: disable customize root dir for macOS App Store builds by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2171
- fix: draw annotations of the current section on load, closes #2163 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2174
- shortcut: use shift+space to go backward in the reader page by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2176
- layout: fix dragbar flickering when opening a book by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2177
- refactor: split FooterBar into modular components for desktop and mobile by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2181
- tts: improve media session control compatibility across more Android systems by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2185
- fix(layout): fix inconsistent background color for unpinned drag bars by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2186
- fix(css): auto height of inline images with object-fit style by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2189
- fix(cbz): fix issue where CBZ files fail to reopen after being closed, closes #2183 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2190
- txt: properly detect chapters in TXT files with dot-number format, closes #2188 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2191
- chore: don't init posthog if users opt-out the usage data telemetry, closes #2187 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2192
- fix: handle scrolling/panning in zoomed in PDFs, closes #2184 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2194
- feat(settings): add settings to adjust screen brightness when reading, closes #1532 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2197
- layout: make TTS icon less distracting during read-aloud mode by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2198
- fix: actually allow script in the transform target, closes #2200 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2203
- fix: show only the filtered books in groups by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2209
- translator: add translator target language of Persian, closes #2206 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2212
- feat: support customizing background images, closes #2018 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2214
- fix(toc): fixed issues of scroll to active items in unpinned sidebar, closes #2213 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2216
- chore: add readest.koplugin in the release workflow by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2217
- chore: enable turbopack by default in development env by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2218
- fix: load custom texture before applying it by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2219
- release: version 0.9.85 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2220
Full Changelog: https://github.com/readest/readest/compare/v0.9.82...v0.9.85
